summary.title: Artificial Intelligence
summary.description: Students learn the algorithms and data structures used in artificial intelligence and to program a range of approaches that computers use to emulate intelligence, such as planning, knowledge representation, learning, decision making and game playing.

course-outcomes.outcome: Identify and apply the appropriate approach for a range of artificial intelligence problems.
Program a computer to learn and retain knowledge.
Program a computer to draw logical deductions from existing propositions.
Program a computer to develop a plan to solve a problem.

course-content.topic: Search: dfs, bfs, A*, local search, adversarial search, constraint satisfaction
Knowledge Reasoning and Planning: logic, planning, inference, knowledge representation
Learning: neural networks, reinforcement learning, probabilistic learning
